languages.text: "Отличная находка, Ваша Светлость. Без сомнения, вы уже сами пришли к этому выводу, но для протокола зафиксирую: мерзкие мутанты не стали бы поминать святую. Это дело рук того, кто разбирается в Кредо".

"Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
languages.original_text: "Отличная находка, Ваша Светлость. Без сомнения, вы уже сами пришли к этому выводу, но для протокола зафиксирую: мерзкие мутанты не стали бы поминать святую. Это дело рук того, кто разбирается в Кредо".

traits.locale_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
"Vile mutants wouldn't have alluded to a saint. It was someone educated about the Creed."

"Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

"Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

"Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

"Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

languages.text: « Bien vu, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez sans doute abouti à la même conclusion que moi, mais je vais tout de même la formuler à voix haute pour la postérité : les mutants impies n'ont pas pour habitude de faire référence aux saints. Autrement dit, nous avons affaire à un individu qui connaît bien le Crédo. »
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: « Bien vu, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez sans doute abouti à la même conclusion que moi, mais je vais tout de même la formuler à voix haute pour la postérité : les mutants impies n'ont pas pour habitude de faire référence aux saints. Autrement dit, nous avons affaire à un individu qui connaît bien le Crédo. »

languages.text: «Bien visto, mil{mf|ord|ady}. No me cabe duda de que ha llegado a la misma conclusión, pero lo expondré para que forme parte del informe oficial: los mutantes inmundos no hacen referencias a santos. Esto es obra de alguien que conoce bien el Credo».
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: «Bien visto, mil{mf|ord|ady}. No me cabe duda de que ha llegado a la misma conclusión, pero lo expondré para que forme parte del informe oficial: los mutantes inmundos no hacen referencias a santos. Esto es obra de alguien que conoce bien el Credo».

languages.text: “您真是目光如炬，大人。毫无疑问，您也得出了同样的结论，但请允许我正式宣布调查结果——邪恶的变种人根本不会崇拜圣人，凶手一定对帝国信仰了如指掌。”
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: “您真是目光如炬，大人。毫无疑问，您也得出了同样的结论，但请允许我正式宣布调查结果——邪恶的变种人根本不会崇拜圣人，凶手一定对帝国信仰了如指掌。”

languages.text: 「よくお気付きで、陛下。 すでに同じ結論に達しているのは間違いありませんが、公式記録のために述べておきます。下劣な変異体は聖人についてほのめかしたりはしません。これは信条に精通した人物です」
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: 「よくお気付きで、陛下。 すでに同じ結論に達しているのは間違いありませんが、公式記録のために述べておきます。下劣な変異体は聖人についてほのめかしたりはしません。これは信条に精通した人物です」

languages.text: Scharf beobachtet, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ihr seid zweifellos bereits zu demselben Schluss gelangt, aber ich sage es noch einmal für die Akten: Widerwärtige Mutanten spielen nicht auf Heilige an. Das war jemand, der mit dem Glauben bestens vertraut ist."
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: Scharf beobachtet, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ihr seid zweifellos bereits zu demselben Schluss gelangt, aber ich sage es noch einmal für die Akten: Widerwärtige Mutanten spielen nicht auf Heilige an. Das war jemand, der mit dem Glauben bestens vertraut ist."

languages.text: "İyi fark ettiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hâlihazırda bir sonuca vardığınıza kuşku yok. Yine de resmî kayıtlar için şunu belirtmem gerekiyor. Habis mutantlar, azizlere dair kinayeler yapmaz. Bu, İtikat'a aşina birisinin işi."
languages.original_text: "Well spotted, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No doubt you have already reached the same conclusion, but I will state it for the official record: vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
